meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>festival</kanji> <kanji>day</kanji> is obviously a <vocabulary>festival day</vocabulary>. This word technically refers to days for Shinto festivals or rituals, but sometimes people also use it to mean a general <vocabulary>national holiday</vocabulary>. This is because some of the Japanese national holidays are based on those traditional Shinto festival days!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
